content: **materials** 1 crochet raffia yarns raffia with passion 1 roll 2 fishing line nylon size 100 lbs the diameter is roughly 1 mm 3 yards 3 adhesive tape **tools** 1 crochet hook 3 mm 2 stitch marker 3 tapestry needle 4 warm iron 5 crown block this beautiful crochet bucket hat is all you need for that beach vibe aesthetic a simple yet trendy design with a unique cable stitch pattern detailed instructions included the finished hat fits a head circumference of 22″ to 23″ it has a crown depth of 6 5″ and comes with a slightly longer front brim 2 5″ than the rear 2″ the hat has a beautiful design around the crown band which is not only presenting its uniqueness but also makes it more breathable for the summer remark for those who don t want to challenge with an unfamiliar cable stitch pattern you may replace this crochet cable stitch with any crochet pattern in a multiple of 4 sts
